text: Wo jiang xiaochu tamen [leyuan de jumin] xinzhong [bici jian keneng cunzai] de yuanhen,[tamen jiang zhu zai] zhu heliuguo de leyuan. Tamen jiang shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la, shi ta yindao women huo ci shan bao de. Jiaru an la bu yindao women, name, women bu keneng zunxing zhengdao. Women de zhu de shizhemen que yi dai lai zhenli.” Tamen jiang tingjian dasheng zhaohuan:“Zhe jiushi nimen yin nimen suo zuo de shangong [zhu] er jicheng de leyuan.”
